roaia_app_info: is an application for escorts to help them to put their eyes on their blind person as Roaia developers we provide features in our app like Gps monitoring to know where the blind is by the place where the roaia glasses in . We provide Alert notification if he fall in trouble there is a notification sent directly to app and the glasses take photo  then sent them to app then escort can go to target place without any problem or obstacle. We provide add contact feature which make glasses know people front of it.
roaia_glasses_info: pair with application for escorts to make life easier for them .As Roaia developers we provide features in glasses like reading text in Arabic or English and can translate it into desirelanguage . We provide gps monitoring to know where blind person by knowing the location of glasses. We provide the glasses with data that it  need to detect object and know people front of it.
